channel.title: I'm bored... Do you play RuneScape? (-> WHAT ABOUT AOE2?! <-)
channel.description:
:confused: :confused:
Post your usernames!! I want to add you to talk to you so I can have fun while I'm mining essence which brings me no fun which brought me to MoparScape to post this so I can [i]add you to talk to you so I can have fun while I'm mining essence[/i]
If you don't want to post your username then don't post, if you play RuneScape then you should know how boring it is having no one to talk to.... If you have no friends online that is :(
[b][size=14pt]OR YOU CAN ALL GET AOE2 AND PLAY WITH ME!![/size][/b]
Please MoparScape! Entertain me, tonight is very boring and I can't wait until tomorrow!! Will be so fun.

item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

Telenim:

I have your private MSN, I just searched for it and it says you’re offline.

Shit, delete/re add me. I think I accidentally deleted you when I did a contact clean up (msn plus feature) I deleted every person that didn’t have me as a contact (it tells u who has u etc).
